name: Key West Africana Festival
short_description: Three-day destination retreat, festival and academic conference focusing on Thought, Culture and Wellness within the African Diaspora.
long_description: Three-day destination retreat, festival and academic conference focusing on Thought, Culture and Wellness within the African Diaspora. Thought: Workshops on topics of cultural, physical and spiritual wellness. Culture: Music, art and cultural tourism, exploring Afro-Caribbean culture in Key West. Wellness: Workshops on healthy living, physical wellness and relationship wellness.
